dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
"Das alte Jerusalem Fig. CIX." -- top right margin.
Place names and title in French; key and upper margin text in German.
Appears in Mallet's Beschreibung des gantzen Welt-Kreisses. Frankfurt/Main : 1684-5. Bd. II Fig. CIX.
